GK16jaycndpu:0: śrīḥ pīyuṣavarṣaśrījayadevakavikṛtaḥ candrālokaḥ uccairasyati mandatāmarasatāṃ jāgratkalaṅkairava-dhvaṃsaṃ hastayate ca yā
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_1.1cd: dhṛṣṭodyanmadanāśanārcir amalā lokatrayīdarśikā sā netratritayīva khaṇḍaparaśor vāgdevatā dīvyatu // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_1.2ab: haṃ ho cinmayacittacandramaṇayaḥ saṃvardhayadhvaṃ rasān re re svairiṇi nirvicārakavite māsmat prakāśībhava /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_1.2cd: ullāsāya vicāravīcinicayālaṅkāravārām nidheś candrālokamayaṃ svayaṃ vitanute pīyūṣavarṣaḥ kṛtī // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_1.3ab: yuktyāsvādyalasadrasaikavasatiḥ sāhityasārasvata-kṣīrāmbhodhir agādhatām upadadhat sevyaḥ samāśrīyatām /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_1.3cd: śrīr asmād upadeśakauśalamayaṃ pīyūṣam asmājjagaj jāgradbhāsurapadmakeśarayaśaḥśītāṃśur asmād budhāḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_1.5cd: kiṃ tu cakṣur mṛgākṣīṇāṃ kajjaleneva bhūṣyate // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_1.8cd: asau na manyate kasmād anuṣṇam analaṃ kṛtī // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_1.12cd: nīradhiḥ paṅkajaṃ saudhaḥ sāgaro bhūruhaḥ śaśī // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_1.14ab: yuktārthatāṃ tāṃ ca vinā khaṇḍavākyaṃ sa iṣyate /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_1.14cd: vākyaṃ ca khaṇḍavākyaṃ ca padam ekam api kvacit // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_1.15ab: dhūmavattvād iti yathā devety āmantraṇaṃ yathā /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_1.16ab: mahādevaḥ satrapramukhamakhavidyaikacaturaḥ sumitrā tadbhaktipraṇihitamatir yasya pitarau
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_1.16cd: anenāsāv ādyaḥ sukavijayadevena racite ciraṃ candrāloke sukhayatu mayūkhaḥ sumanasaḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_2.1ab: syāc ceto viśatā yena sakṣatā ramaṇīyatā /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_2.1cd: śabde 'rthe ca kṛtonmeṣaṃ doṣam udghoṣayanti tam // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_2.4ab: sa hanti hanta kāntāre kāntaḥ kuṭilakuntalaḥ /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_2.5ab: vyanakty anucitārthaṃ yat padam āhus tadeva tat /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_2.7ab: dhatte nabhastalaṃ bhāsvān aruṇaṃ taruṇaiḥ karaiḥ /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_2.9ab: syād dvyartham iha sandigdhaṃ nadyāṃ yānti patatriṇaḥ /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_2.10ab: śithilaṃ śayane lilye maccitaṃ te śaśiśriyi /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_2.15cd: na mām aṅgada jānāsi rāvaṇaṃ raṇadāruṇam // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_2.16ab: yasminn upahato lupto visarga iha tat tathā /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_2.16cd: kusandhiḥ paṭav āgaccha visandhir nṛpatī imau // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_2.24ab: dviṣāṃ sampadam ācchidya yaḥ śatrūn samapūrayat /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_2.25ab: mithaḥ pṛthagvākyapadaiḥ saṃkīrṇaṃ yat tad eva tat /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_2.25cd: vaktreṇa bhrājate rātriḥ kāntā candreṇa rājate // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_2.27cd: akramaḥ kṛṣṇa pūjyante tvām anabhyarcya devatāḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_2.29ab: apuṣṭārtho viśeṣye cen na viśeṣo viśeṣaṇāt /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_2.32cd: tvadbhaktaḥ kṛṣṇa! gaccheyaṃ narakaṃ svargam eva vā // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_2.33ab: ekaṃ me cumbanaṃ dehi tava dāsyāmi kañcukam /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_2.34cd: prasiddhyā vidyayā vāpi viruddhaṃ dvividhaṃ matam // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_2.37cd: dhvāṅkṣāḥ santaś ca tanayaṃ svaṃ paraṃ ca na jānate // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_2.40cd: nivārayati yas tredhā doṣāṅkuśam uśanti tam // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_2.41ab: doṣe guṇatvaṃ tanute doṣatvaṃ vā nirasyati /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_2.44cd: atra śleṣodayān naiva tyājyaṃ hīti nirarthakam // //
GK16jaycndpu:121: mahādevaḥ satrapramukhamakhavidyaikacaturaḥ sumitrā tadbhaktipraṇihitamatir yasya pitarau
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_3.1ab: dvitīyas tenāsau sukavijayadevena racite ciraṃ candrāloke sukhayatu mayūkhaḥ sumanasaḥ // alpākṣarā vicitrārtha-khyātir akṣarasaṃhatiḥ /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_3.2cd: mudhā nindanti saṃsāraṃ kaṃsārir yatra pūjyate // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_3.3cd: indur yadi kathaṃ tīvraḥ sūryo yadi kathaṃ niśi // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_3.4cd: nendur nārko 'yam aurvāgniḥ sāgarād utthito dahan // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_3.5cd: na yuddhena bhruvoḥ spandenaiva vīrā nipātitāḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_3.6ab: niruktaṃ syān nirvacanaṃ nāmnaḥ satyaṃ tathānṛtam /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_3.6cd: īdṛśaiś caritai rājan satyaṃ doṣākaro bhavān // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_3.8ab: siddhiḥ khyāteṣu cen nāma kīrtyate tulyatoktaye /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_3.8cd: yuvām eveha vikhyātau tvaṃ balair jaladhir jalaiḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_3.9cd: navas tvaṃ nīradaḥ ko 'pi svarṇair varṣasi yan muhuḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_3.10ab: kāryaṃ phalopalambhaś ced vyāpārād vastuto 'tha vā /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_3.12ab: mahādevaḥ satrapramukhamakhavidyaikacaturaḥ sumitrā tadbhaktipraṇihitamatir yasya pitarau
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_3.12cd: tṛtīyas tenāsau sukavijayadevena racite ciraṃ candrāloke sukhayatu mayūkhaḥ sumanasaḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_4.1cd: sa tu śābdaḥ sajātīyaiḥ śabdair bandhaḥ sukhāvahaḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_4.3cd: salilasyeva sūktasya sa prasāda iti smṛtaḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_4.4cd: śyāmalā komalā bālā ramaṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatā // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_4.7ab: ojaḥ syāt prauḍhir arthasya saṃkṣepo vātibhūyasaḥ /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_4.7cd: ripuṃ hatvā yaśaḥ kṛtvā tvadasiḥ kośam āviśat // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_4.9cd: mānaṃ muñca priye kiṃcil locanāntam udañcaya // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_4.10cd: amī daśa guṇāḥ kāvye puṃsi śauryādayo yathā // //
GK16jaycndpu:170: mahādevaḥ satrapramukhamakhavidyaikacaturaḥ sumitrā tadbhaktipraṇihitamatir yasya pitarau
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.1ab: caturthas tenāsau sukavijayadevena racite ciraṃ candrāloke sukhayatu mayūkhaḥ sumanasaḥ // śabdārthayoḥ prasiddhyā vā kaveḥ prauḍhivaśena vā /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.4cd: yatra syān na punaḥ śatror garjitaṃ taj jitaṃ jitam // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.5ab: ślokasyārdhe tadardhe vā varṇāvṛttir yadi dhruvā /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.7cd: aṃśukāntaṃ śaśī kurvann ambarāntam upaity asau // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.13ab: paryāyeṇa dvayos tac ced upameyopamā matā /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.13cd: dharmo 'rtha iva pūrṇaśrīr artho dharma iva tvayi // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.14cd: indur mukham ivetyādau syāt pratīpopamā tadā // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.16cd: śrito 'smi caraṇau viṣṇor bhṛṅgas tāmarasaṃ yathā // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.17ab: syāt saṃpūrṇopamā yatra dvayor api vidheyatā /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.22cd: kāntena pṛṣṭā rahasi maunam evottaraṃ dadau // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.23cd: strībhiḥ kāmaḥ priyaiś candraḥ kālaḥ śatrubhir aikṣi saḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.25cd: nāyaṃ sudhāṃśuḥ kiṃ tarhi sudhāṃśuḥ preyasīmukham // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.26cd: tāpaṃ tanoti sotkampaṃ jvaraḥ kiṃ na sakhi smaraḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.27cd: prajalpan matpade lagnaḥ kāntaḥ kiṃ na hi nūpuraḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.31cd: paṅkajaṃ paśyatas tasyā mukhaṃ me gāhate manaḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.32cd: paṅkajaṃ vā sudhāṃśur vety asmākaṃ tu na nirṇayaḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.33ab: mīlitaṃ bahusādṛśyād bhedavac cen na lakṣyate /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.34ab: sāmānyaṃ yadi sādṛśyād bheda eva na lakṣyate /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.35ab: hetoḥ kuto 'pi vaiśiṣṭyāt sphūrtir unmīlitaṃ matam /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.35cd: lakṣitāny udite candre padmāni ca mukhāni ca // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.36cd: asti kiñcid yadanayā māṃ vilokya smitaṃ manāk // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.37cd: sa jitas tvanmukhenenduḥ kā vārtā sarasīruhām // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.41cd: āliṅganti samaṃ deva jyāṃ śarāś ca parāś ca te // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.42cd: agre māno gataḥ paścād anunītā priyeṇa sā // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.48ef: mauktikaṃ cel latāṃ sūte tatpuṣpais te samaṃ yaśaḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.49cd: dīpam uddyotayed yāvat tāvad abhyudito raviḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.50cd: dīpam uddyotayed yāvat tāvan nirvāṇa eva saḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.52cd: medhāṃ budhaḥ sudhām indur bibharti vasudhāṃ bhavān // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.53cd: dīptyāgnir bhāti bhātīnduḥ kāntyā bhāti ravis tviṣā // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.54cd: tāpena bhrājate sūraḥ śūraś cāpena rājate // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.56ab: dṛṣṭāntaś ced bhavanmūrtis tan mṛṣṭā daivadurlipiḥ /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.56cd: jātā cet prāk prabhā bhānos tarhi yātā vibhāvarī // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.57cd: yā dātuḥ saumyatā seyaṃ sudhāṃśor akalaṅkatā // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.58cd: śailā ivonnatāḥ santaḥ kiṃ tu prakṛtikomalāḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.59cd: digantam agamad yasya kīrtiḥ pratyarthibhiḥ saha // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.60ab: vinoktiś ced vinā kiṃcit prastutaṃ hīnam ucyate /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.61cd: ayam aindrīmukhaṃ paśya raktaś cumbati candramāḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.64cd: kuṭilāḥ śyāmalā dīrghā kaṭākṣāḥ kuntalāś ca te // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.66ab: kamalaiḥ kamalāvāsaiḥ kiṃ kiṃ nāsādi sundaram /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.66cd: apy ambudheḥ paraṃ pāraṃ prayānti vyavasāyinaḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.67cd: hanūmān abdhim atarad duṣkaraṃ kiṃ mahātmanām // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.68cd: sa na jigye mahānto hi durdharṣāḥ kṣmādharā iva // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.70cd: kaste viveko nayasi svargaṃ pātakino 'pi yat // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.72ab: gūḍhākṣepo vidhau vyakte niṣedhe cāsphuṭe sati /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.72cd: hara sītāṃ sukhaṃ, kiṃ tu cintayāntakaḍhaukanam // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.76ab: vibhāvanā vināpi syāt kāraṇaṃ kāryajanma cet /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.77cd: namantam api dhīmantaṃ na laṅghayati kaścana // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.78cd: tvadbhaktānāṃ namaty aṅgaṃ bhaṅgam eti bhavaklamaḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.81cd: namanti santas trailokyād api labdhuṃ samunnatim // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.82cd: yayā vyāptaṃ jagat tasyāṃ vāci mānti na te guṇāḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.83ab: anyonyaṃ nāma yatra syād upakāraḥ parasparam /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.83cd: triyāmā śaśinā bhāti śaśī bhāti triyāmayā // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.84cd: gate 'pi sūrye dīpasthās tamaś chindanti tatkarāḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.85cd: yair jagat prīyate hanti tair eva kusumāyudhaḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.86cd: nayena śrīḥ śriyā tyāgas tyāgena vipulaṃ yaśaḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.88cd: smareṇa hṛdaye tasyās tena tvayi kṛtā sthitiḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.89cd: sāraṃ sārasvataṃ tatra kāvyaṃ tatra śivastavaḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.90cd: madhuraṃ madhu pīyūṣaṃ tasmāt tasmāt kaver vacaḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.91cd: śatruṃ mitraṃ dviṣatpakṣaṃ jaya rañjaya bhañjaya // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.92ab: paryāyaś ced anekatra syād ekasya samanvayaḥ /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.96cd: naśyanti paścāt paśyanti bhraśyanti ca tava dviṣaḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.97cd: utkaṇṭhitāṃ ca kalayan jagāmāstaṃ ca bhānumān // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.99cd: dṛṣṭaṃ ced vadanaṃ tasyāḥ kiṃ padmena kimindunā // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.100ab: ullāso 'nyamahimnā ced doṣo hy anyatra varṇyate /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.100cd: tad abhāgyaṃ dhanasyaiva yan nāśrayati sajjanam // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.103cd: dīpe nirvāpite hy āsīt kāñcīratnair aharmahaḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.104cd: viśann api raver madhyaṃ śīta eva sadā śaśī // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.106cd: mlāyanti yadi padmāni kā hānir amṛtadyuteḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.107cd: yatrāsau vetasī pāntha tatrāsau sutarā sarit // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.108cd: priye gṛhāgate prātaḥ kāntā talpam akalpayat // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.110cd: muñca mānaṃ dinaṃ prāptaṃ manda nandī harāntike // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.113cd: tvaṃ vasan hṛdaye tasyāḥ sākṣāt pañceṣur īkṣyase // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.117cd: alaṅkārān imān sapta kecid āhur manīṣiṇaḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.119cd: upādhiḥ kvacid udbhinnaḥ syād anyatrāpi saṃbhavāt // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_5.120cd: manuṣye bhavataḥ kvāpi hy alaṅkārāṅgatāṃ gate // //
GK16jaycndpu:421: mahādevaḥ satrapramukhamakhavidyaikacaturaḥ sumitrā tadbhaktipraṇihitamatir yasya pitarau
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_6.1ab: caturthaḥ saikoyam sukavijayadevena racite ciraṃ candrāloke sukhayatu mayūkhaḥ sumanasaḥ // ālambanoddīpanātmā vibhāvaḥ kāraṇaṃ dvidhā /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_6.1cd: kāryo 'nubhāvo bhāvaś ca sahāyo vyabhicāry api // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_6.3ab: kāvye nāṭye ca kārye ca vibhāvādyair vibhāvitaḥ /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_6.5cd: sambhogo vipralambhaś ca śṛṅgāro dvividho mataḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_6.7cd: vibhāvādyair yutaḥ śoka-sthāyī syāt karuṇo rasaḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_6.15cd: ālasyaṃ caiva dainyaṃ ca cintā mohaḥ smṛtir dhṛtiḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_6.16ab: vrīḍā capalatā harṣa āvego jaḍatā tathā /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_6.16cd: garvo viṣāda autsukyaṃ nidrāpasmāra eva ca // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_6.17cd: matir vyādhis tathonmādas tathā maraṇam eva ca // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_6.18ab: trāsaś caiva vitarkaś ca vijñeyā vyabhicāriṇaḥ /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_6.18cd: trayastriṃśad ime bhāvāḥ samākhyātās tu nāmataḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_6.20ab: bhāvasya śāntir udayaḥ sandhiḥ śabalatā tathā /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_6.21cd: samāsaḥ syāt padair na syāt samāsaḥ sarvathāpi ca // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_6.22ab: pāñcālikī ca lāṭīyā gauḍīyā ca yathārasam /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_6.22cd: vaidarbhī ca yathāsaṃkhyaṃ catasro rītayaḥ smṛtāḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_6.24cd: kapākrāntas tavargaḥ syāt prauḍhāyāṃ ca kamūrdhatā // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_6.25ab: sarvair ūrdhvaiḥ sakārasya sarvai rephasya sarvathā /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_6.25cd: rahor dvedhā tu saṃyogaḥ paruṣāyāṃ śaṣau svataḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_6.26cd: lalitāyāṃ tathā śeṣā bhadrāyām iti vṛttayaḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_6.29ab: mahādevaḥ satrapramukhamakhavidyaikacaturaḥ sumitrā tadbhaktipraṇihitamatir yasya pitarau
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_6.29cd: mayūkhastenāsau sukavijayadevena racite ciraṃ candrāloke sukhayatu mahati ṛtusaṃkhyaḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_7.1cd: bhāratī bhāti gambhīrā kuṭilā saralā kvacit // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_7.3ab: avivakṣitavācyasya dvau bhedau vācyam eva cet /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_7.7ab: catvāro vastv alaṃkāram alaṃkāras tu vastu yat /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_7.7cd: alaṃkāram alaṃkāro vastu vastu vyanakti tat // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_7.8cd: svasiddho vā vyañjako 'rthaś catvāras triguṇās tataḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_7.11ab: ye ṣoḍaśādyā dviguṇās te syur vākyapadāśrayāt /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_7.12cd: bhedāḥ syur ekapañcāśat saṃbhinnās tu sahasraśaḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_7.17cd: arthe 'rtham anyaṃ yaṃ vakti tad vācyavyaṅgyam iṣyate // //
GK16jaycndpu:514: mahādevaḥ satrapramukhamakhavidyaikacaturaḥ sumitrā tadbhaktipraṇihitamatir yasya pitarau
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_8.1ab: mayūkhastenāsau sukavijayadevena racite ciraṃ candrāloke sukhayatu mahati munisaṃkhyaḥ // yad vyajyamānaṃ manasaḥ staimityāya sa no dhvaniḥ /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_8.2ab: vyaktir eva kvacid vyaṅgyaḥ kvacid arthasvabhāvataḥ /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_8.3cd: vismṛtaḥ kim apāṃnātha sa tvayā kumbhasaṃbhavaḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_8.4cd: hā hā! matkucakāśmīra-liptaṃ bhinnam uraḥ śaraiḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_8.5ab: tathā vācyasya siddhyaṅgaṃ naur artho vāridher yathā /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_8.9ab: asundaraṃ yadi vyaṅgyaṃ syād vācyād amanoharam /
GK16jaycndpu:535: mahādevaḥ satrapramukhamakhavidyaikacaturaḥ sumitrā tadbhaktipraṇihitamatir yasya pitarau
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_9.1ab: mayūkhastenāsau sukavijayadevena racite ciraṃ candrāloke mahati vasusaṃkhyaḥ sukhayatu // mukhyārthasyāvivakṣāyāṃ pūrvārvācī ca rūḍhitaḥ /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_9.1cd: prayojanāc ca saṃbaddhaṃ vadantī lakṣaṇā matā // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_9.3cd: viduḥ sphuṭaṃ taṭasthatvād arthagatvād dvidhā budhāḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_9.6ab: anyās tisra iti vyaktā śaktitaḥ sā caturvidhā /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_9.6cd: indur evaiṣa tadvaktram utkarṣo lakṣyate mukhe // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_9.7cd: paṭo 'yaṃ dagdha ityādau sphuṭaṃ nāsti prayojanam // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_9.11ab: gauṇaṃ sāropam uddiṣṭam indur mukham itīdṛśam /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_9.11cd: gauṇaṃ sādhyavasānaṃ syād indur evedam īdṛśam // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_9.12ab: śuddhaṃ sāropam uddiṣṭam āyur ghṛtam itīdṛśam /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_9.12cd: śuddhaṃ sādhyavasānaṃ syād āyur evedam īdṛśam // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_9.13cd: kuntā viśanti gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣo nivasatīti ca // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_9.14cd: sarasaṃ kāvyam amṛtaṃ vidyā sthirataraṃ dhanam // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_9.15cd: saundaryeṇaiṣa kandarpaḥ sā ca mūrtimatī ratiḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_9.16ab: śabde padārthe vākyārthe saṃkhyāyāṃ kārake tathā /
GK16jaycndpu:568: mahādevaḥ satrapramukhamakhavidyaikacaturaḥ sumitrā tadbhaktipraṇihitamatir yasya pitarau
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_10.1ab: mayūkhastenāsau sukavijayadevena racite ciraṃ candrāloke mahati navasaṃkhyaḥ sukhayatu // dharmaṃ kaṃcit puraskṛtya prāyaḥ śabdaḥ pravartate /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_10.1cd: yayārthaṃ spaṣṭam ācaṣṭe śabdas tām abhidhāṃ viduḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_10.2cd: nirdeśena tathā prāhuḥ ṣaḍvidhām abhidhāṃ budhāḥ // //
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_10.3ab: gaur nīlaḥ pācako daṇḍī ḍitthaḥ kaṃsa iti kramāt /
GK16jaycndpu:jcand_10.3cd: kaṃ saṃhinasti kaṃsārir naraṃ ca kaṃ samāśritam // //
GK16jaycndpu:581: mahādevaḥ satrapramukhamakhavidyaikacaturaḥ sumitrā tadbhaktipraṇihitamatir yasya pitarau
